comments: <remarks>ChannelCreationOptions is a parameter used when subscribing to a public channel for the first time.</remarks>

docstrings: <summary>The Photon Chat Api enables clients to connect to a chat server and communicate with other clients.</summary>
<summary>Whether or not the channel to be created will allow client to keep a list of users.</summary>
<summary>Limit of the number of users subscribed to the channel to be created.</summary>
